name: Iridescence
description: Iridescence is a Shoot 'Em Up with a color-changing mechanic, where you dodge and absorb many different colored bullets. It features a painted watercolor theme & features an inventive chaining system. Play through 5 main levels and 30 varied challenge levels!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 125 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3.0 ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB+ DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 125 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended
